Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Pontiac in 1974...
Injured on 4/10/1977 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/15/1979 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/14/1980, off Javier Fleites (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/1980, off Scott Jean (PIL)...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Traded from Pontiac to New Jersey on 7/30/1984 (Going to NJ: CF R. Pedrosa. Going to PON: 3B G. Ruth, P D. Mejia)...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/26/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Ashburn on 6/5/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 7/22/1987...
